How to develop a formatter

How to develop a formatter

A formatter is used to format the results of sonar. It can be as simple as just outputing the results in JSON format, or as complex as connecting to a database and storing the results in it.

To create one, you just need a module that exports an object with a method named format(). This method will receive an array of messages if any issues have been found.

The following is a basic formatter that just .stringify()s the results:

A message looks like this:

With this, you can group the issues by resource and sort them by line and column. Using the previous example and lodash will look as follows:

You can always check the code of any of the official formatters for more complex scenarios.
